title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog not shown when dataset is not set
OB: When a table report item is added without setting the dataset, an error is shown instead of showing the group dialog.
EB: The group dialog should be shown even if the dataset is not set. Users should be able to define a group in this scenario.
SR:
1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset.
2. Try to create a new table group.
3. Verify if the group dialog is shown.
